name: Gastr del Sol
description: '''Gastr del Sol''' (derived from a combination of the name of a race horse (Gato del Sol) and David Grubbs' previous band Bastro) was an American, [[Chicago]]-based band, consisting for most of their career of [[David Grubbs]] and [[Jim O'Rourke (musician)|Jim O'Rourke]].  Between 1993 and 1998 they released seven albums ranging in genre from [[post-rock]] (the scene they were most associated with) to [[musique concr√®te]].
